titles.title: Expressing support for designation of May 13, 2015, as a national day of celebration of the diversity in the United States, known as Diversity Day in the Nation.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Oversight and Government Reform.

term.name: Civil rights and liberties, minority issues

bill.summary:
4/15/2015--Introduced. Expresses support for the designation of a national day of celebration for the diversity of the United States.
Encourages the people of the United States to promote cultural awareness, combat polarization and stereotypes, and improve community understanding and cooperation among people from different cultures.
